name: Chrono Gunner (MarcoSant)
description: Hi, thanks for checking my game! My name is Marco and I made this game alone for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. The theme for this jam was: Rewind. It was my first game jam and I loved it! I hope you can enjoy my game too :) Commands: A, D to Move; Space or W to Jump; Shoot with Left Click mouse Core Gameplay: You must protect and follow a Totem until the timer runs out. Enemies will spawn from random locations, but you can stop them from reaching the Totem by hitting them with your Rewind Gun! Just be careful of their path!  Credits:  Art, Warped Caves: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/warped-caves-103250 Sound: FREE Cyberpunk Vol. 1 Music Pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/free-cyberpunk-vol-1-music-pack-165610 + files from Freesound.org Programming and design: Done by me with a little help of Chronos https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/chronos-31225 for time managing.
